temp = []
    for x in range(0,5):
        for i in range(0,4):
            currentFinger = hand[x]
            temp.append(str(currentFinger[i][0]))
            for j in range(1,4):
                for k in range(0,3):
                    temp.append(str(currentFinger[i][j][k]))
    print(temp)
